siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.excerpt:
While in the single server view with boxes of text and charts, scroll all the way up to where there is a button 
with the current selected server name on itâ€¦
markdownRemark.html:
While in the single server view with boxes of text and charts, scroll all the way up to where there is a button with the current selected server name on it.

Click on this name to view dropdown of all the servers in a workspace. Select any to switch.

frontmatter.title: How to switch server on the single server view without going back to the servers list?
How to view more than 1 hour of logs?
How to remove boxes from the dashboard?
